title: Agent Description Schema
description: Schema for defining agent roles and capabilities in AgentsMCP

type.description: Unique identifier for the agent type

description.description: Brief description of the agent's role and responsibilities

system_prompt.description: Detailed system prompt that defines the agent's personality and behavior

tools.description: List of tools the agent has access to

capabilities.description: List of key capabilities and skills

specializations.description: Specific areas of specialization within the role

collaboration_patterns.description: Other agent types this agent frequently collaborates with

quality_gates.description: Quality checks and gates this agent enforces
